entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:38 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:38 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
